code: export var handleKeywordSearch=function handleKeywordSearch(jobs,value){var cache={};if(value in cache){return cache[value];}else{var results=jobs.filter(function(job){return job.title.toLowerCase().includes(value.toLowerCase());});if(results){cache[value]=results;return results;}else{return null;}}};export var handleCitySearch=function handleCitySearch(jobs,value){var cache={};if(value in cache){return cache[value];}else{var results=jobs.filter(function(job){return job.location.toLowerCase().includes(value.toLowerCase());});if(results){cache[value]=results;return results;}else{return null;}}};
